statements: SELECT * FROM SalesData
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT product_id, customer_id, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_amount DESC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM SalesData GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT sale_id, customer_id, product_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM SalesData WHERE sale_id = 100
SELECT customer_id, product_id, sale_amount, sale_date, sale_id FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000
SELECT product_id, sale_amount, customer_id, sale_date, sale_id FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT customer_id, sale_amount, product_id, sale_date, sale_id FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE customer_id = 500 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, order_total FROM sales_data ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, address, country FROM customer_data WHERE city='New York';
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_total FROM sales_data WHERE order_total > 1000 ORDER BY order_total ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, city FROM customer_data WHERE country='USA';
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA';
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_total FROM sales_data WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address, city, country FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 205 AND city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT customer_name, email, address, city FROM customer_data WHERE country = 'Canada' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sales;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, sale_amount FROM Sales WHERE sale_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY category, product_name;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(sale_amount) as total_sales FROM Customers JOIN Sales ON Customers.customer_id = Sales.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, SUM(sale_amount) as total_sales FROM Products JOIN Sales ON Products.product_id = Sales.product_id GROUP BY product_name, category ORDER BY category, total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT customer_name, payment_amount FROM customers JOIN payment_history ON customers.customer_id = payment_history.payment_id;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT order_date, quantity, total_price FROM sales_data WHERE total_price > 100 ORDER BY order_date ASC;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, total_price FROM sales_data JOIN customers ON sales_data.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN products ON sales_data.product_id = products.product_id ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY customer_name, customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 3 ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY phone_number DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT order_date, total_amount, customer_name FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE total_amount < 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
